name: Speed Cola
desc: Drinking that Speed Cola has made you feel like you could run a mile a minute!
remove_message: You feel yourself slowing down again...

name: Stamin-Up
desc: Drinking that Stamin-Up makes you feel like you could run forever!
remove_message: Strangely, it feels like running takes actual effort once more.

name: Deadshot Daiquiri
desc: A few sips of Deadshot Daiquiri, and your hands almost automatically aim at the head of whatever you're aiming at!
remove_message: Seems like you're gonna have to put actual effort into aiming again.

name: Tufbrew
desc: Drinking that Tufbrew has made you feel like you could go 12 rounds against Muhammed Ali.
remove_message: Your confidence in holding up in a championship match seems to fade.

name: Juggernog
desc: Drinking that Juggernog makes you feel healthier like you ever did!
remove_message: Did all those cuts always hurt so much?

name: Death Perception Soda
desc: Drinking the Death Perception Soda lets you see things you previously couldn't.
remove_message: All of a sudden, it feels like you've lost one of your senses.

name: Quick Revive Soda
desc: Drinking the Quick Revive Soda makes your wounds close before your eyes!
remove_message: You feel that invigorating energy leave your body again.

name: Double Tap Root Beer
desc: Spinning that revolver has never felt that easy before!
remove_message: Was getting ready to shoot always this difficult?

name: Bandolier Bandit Soda
desc: Sisyphus would be envious of your strength!
remove_message: Were your clothes always this heavy?

name: Mule Kick Cerveza
desc: You feel like Atlas carrying the world on your shoulder!
remove_message: That sense of responsibility and strength fade away.

name: Blood Wolf Bite
description: That big puppy certainly looks nice to you!
